definition: to change/to become different/to transform/to vary/rebellion
lower form of animal life, including insects, insect larvae, worms and similar creatures/CL:條|条[tiao2],隻|只[zhi1]/(fig.) person with a particular undesirable characteristic

sentences.english: Amoebas turn out to be great places to seek out new viruses.
sentences.chinese: 变形虫变成寻找新病毒的好场所。

sentences.english: Come on! Are you a man or an amoeba?
sentences.chinese: 安德森先生，快点你是个人或阿米巴变形虫？

sentences.english: An amoeba forms a cyst when conditions are unfavourable.
sentences.chinese: 当环境不利时，变形虫产生包囊。

sentences.english: Entamoeba histolytica is, possibly, the most pathogenic amoeba for humans.
sentences.chinese: 阿米巴原虫大概是对人最容易引起疾病的变形虫。

sentences.english: The axon then continues to grow, towed by an amoeboid structure at its tip.
sentences.chinese: 轴突前端有变形虫般的构造，会牵引轴突往前生长。

sentences.english: Go to the official website of Metamorphosis.
sentences.chinese: 按此到变形虫爵士乐团的官方网站。

sentences.english: Amoebas are too small to see.
sentences.chinese: 变形虫羸小而目所难及。

sentences.english: Cells of the amoeboid stage lacked the methanogenic endosymbionts.
sentences.chinese: 变形虫阶段的细胞仍不含内共生菌。

sentences.english: The sources of species collects out door, Amoeba Limax is cultured un der constant temperature in doors.
sentences.chinese: 野外采集种源，室内恒温培养蛞蝓变形虫。
